text.author: Zhimiao Tao
text.title: Two-Stage Supply-Chain Optimization Considering Consumer Low-Carbon Awareness under Cap-and-Trade Regulation

p.s: In this section , a series of numerical examples are presented to illustrate the theoretical results proposed in this study .
